mapper.insert: insert into tbl_request_experience(experience_notice_id, member_id, member_alarm_setting_id, request_experience_member_name, request_experience_member_email, request_experience_member_phone, request_experience_member_url, file_id) values(#{experienceNoticeId}, #{memberId}, #{memberAlarmSettingId}, #{requestExperienceMemberName}, #{requestExperienceMemberEmail}, #{requestExperienceMemberPhone}, #{requestExperienceMemberUrl}, #{fileId})
